name: Animal Force
description: There is no dizzy, no horror, no zombies,and no guns, Animal Force is a happy & funny game for all age game players.This game include single player mode and 3 local multiplayer modes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Haswell or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Haswell or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
